extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of Avalanche, Ivanti File Director, or MobileIron.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Mitigation for Avalanche
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the available mitigation or fix for Avalanche versions 6.3.0, 6.3.1, 6.3.2, and 6.3.3.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Mitigation for Ivanti File Director
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the available mitigation or fix for Ivanti File Director versions 2020.3, 2021.1, and 2021.3.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Mitigation for MobileIron
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the available mitigation or fix for MobileIron as per the provided guidance.
